WorkItem.Description:
$(SELECTOR).rateit('value', 0);
doesn't work, it will only accept a string representation of '0'.
Â 
Setting it to any other numerical value does work correctly.

Comments.Message: Thanks!  Also, if it could accept a Null or include a equivalent Reset, that would be nice.  I can certainly code that a value of 0 is equivalent to a null or No Rating, but not sure if that is the same for everyone.  The default is null so it would be nice to set it back to that.
